function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupants may consider air quality unacceptable regardless of objective performance, leading to dissatisfaction and potential health risks.","Impact":"Decreased occupant satisfaction, potential health issues from poor indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Regular IAQ monitoring, implementation of air quality improvement measures, and education on the importance of IAQ.","Technologies":"IAQ sensors, ventilation systems, air purifiers, and smart building management systems.","People":"Building occupants.","Owner":"Building management and facilities maintenance team."},{"Description":"Lower acceptance for high CO2 concentrations in building type A compared to building type B, leading to potential dissatisfaction and discomfort for occupants.","Impact":"Decreased occupant satisfaction, discomfort, and potential health issues from exposure to high CO2 concentrations.","Mitigation":"Optimization of ventilation systems, adjustment of building design, and education on the importance of maintaining healthy CO2 levels.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, building design optimization tools, and occupant behavior analytics.","People":"Building occupants.","Owner":"Building management and facilities maintenance team."},{"Description":"Comparison of different IEQ monitoring tools and systems, which may result in the adoption of suboptimal systems and inadequate IEQ management.","Impact":"Inefficient IEQ monitoring, potential failure to detect and address indoor air quality issues.","Mitigation":"Comprehensive evaluation of IEQ monitoring tools, consultation with experts, and regular updates to adopt the most effective systems.","Technologies":"IEQ monitoring tools, data analytics platforms, and expert consultation services.","People":"Building management and facilities maintenance team.","Owner":"Building management and facilities maintenance team."}]}
